text: Avo tulongeze? Kamba Malagizo ga Musa gago vilozo? Si vivo! Kamba kuhakalile haduhu Malagizo ga Musa, sambinivitange vilozo. Sambinivitange kamba kusulukila vinhu va wanhu kukala vilozo kamba Gamalagizo ga Musa sambigalonge, “Sambiusulukile vinhu va wanhu.”7:7 Mbuli zino zolawa mkitabu cha KUHALAWA 20:17; NG'HUMBUKILA YA TOLATI 5:21.
